name: Dye Gaga Dye!
description:
Our original Abandon Your Fashion tee re-imagined with a rad as fuck tie dye design. Hand tie-dyed by the Abandoned Clothing Crew, this piece belongs in your wardrobe. 

As usual all of our clothes are Unisex.

Printed on Gildan Heavy Cotton.

Styling suggestions:
- Black Jeans or shorts
- Beanie hat (not blue) 
- Size up, get a baggy size, roll sleeves

Recommended that you turn your product inside out and wash on a 30 degrees setting. Do not tumble dry. 

Availability:
Small - SOLD OUT
Medium - SOLD OUT
Large - 1
Extra Large - SOLD OUT

name: Logo Beanie
description:
These unisex Beanies are of the finest quality hats and patches, professionally stitched and super comfy!
One Size Fits All.

Looks awesome with jeans/shorts and a white tee.

Available in:
Burgundy - SOLD OUT
Black - 5
Bottle Green - 5

name: Abandon Your Fashion Sense
description:
The queen of pop music wanted to do a photo shoot with us, we gave her about 5 minutes of our times. Never done before, Lady Gaga repping Abandoned Clothing.

As usual, all our clothing is Unisex.

Printed on Gildan Heavy.

Recommended that you turn your t shirt inside our and wash at a 30 degree wash. Do not tumble dry.

Small - 8
Medium - 4
Large - 3
X Large - SOLD OUT

If you want to see more pictures of this product, please visit our Facebook page and look at the Abandoned Clothing Family!

name: Stuck In The Middle
description:
Ever felt like you were stuck in the middle? We have. Featuring a never-before-done Malcolm in the Middle design writing a list of his favourite clothing brands.

As usual, all our clothing is Unisex.

Printed on Gildan Heavy.

Styling Suggestions:
- Black Skinny jeans, Denim Shorts or Leggings
- Roll the Sleeves
- Get some Jewellery, rings Necklaces
- Fresh Vans or some bright high tops

Recommended that you turn your tee inside out and wash at a 30 degress wash. Do not tumble dry.

Small - 4
Medium - 1
Large - 2
Extra Large - SOLD OUT

If you want to see more pictures of this product, please visit our Facebook page and look at the Abandoned Clothing Family!

name: Fend For Yourself
description:
This original and fresh design will be a good addition to your wardrobe! Featuring a boy, holding a pistol and rocking his very own Abandoned Clothing Hat. At Â£6.00 a must have.

As usual, all our clothing is Unisex.

Printed on Gildan Heavy/Ultra Cotton.

Styling suggestions
- Get the size up, wear baggy
- Roll the sleeves
- Mix with blue jeans
- Fresh Vans

Recommended that you turn your tee inside out and wash at a 30 degrees wash. Do not tumble dry.

Availability:

Small - SOLD OUT
Medium - 1
Large - SOLD OUT
Extra Large - SOLD OUT
